title: Quantum 3
description:
Quantum 3 is an educational match-3 game for all ages where fun meets quantum physics! 
 I was responsible for the grid system, the powerup system, and the tutorial systems. Build subatomic particles, learn about the mysteries of fundamental physics and deploy antimatter to clear the way!

title: Mechalangelo
description: Mechalangelo is an asyncronous 1-vs-1 multiplayer game for the HTC Vive (via Steam VR) and an Xbox 360 controller. The VR player takes on the role of a giant painting machine, and the controller player takes on the role of a glider. First to destroy the other wins! I designed the ship controller and shooting mechanics, as well as the powerup and minion spawner systems.

title: The Grid Glitch
description: The Grid Glitch is an isometric 3D game with snake-like controls. Rally unique bugs that follow the leader to solve puzzles and take over the world! For this project I served as the composer and sound designer, and impmented the news-like UI. I also designed the mid-level and level-by-level save system, and prototyped the movement control.

title: When Rivers Were Trails
description: When Rivers Were Trails is an educational 2D adventure game which follows an Anishinaabeg in the 1890â€™s who is displaced from Fond du Lac in Minnesota to California due to the impact of allotment acts on Indigenous communities. I was brought onto the project late in development to fix the save system and other various bugs.

title: Everything is Magnet
description: Everything is Magnet is a single-player adventure puzzle platformer about using magnets to guide an android who cannot jump through various environments. I did level design, hazard design, and debugged an existing physics engine.
